target: How would you consider flying with Southwest Airlines, with the flight which leaves at 6:15 pm, and when it returns it leaves at 6 am. The price for this flight ticket is $125.
context: <user>  I want to know the weather in Phoenix, AZ. <system>  The average temperature in Phoenix, AZ for the day is expected to be 89 degrees Fahrenheit. Also there is a 15 percent chance that it will rain. <user>  Alright fine. I want you to find me a round trip flight to go there. I would like for the flight ticket to be an Economy class one. <system>  Can you tell me the day when you will be having your return flight? Will you be departing on March 1st? <user>  That suits me well. I will be returning on 4th of this month. <system>  Can you tell me from which city you will leave? <user>  I will be departing for my flight from SFO. <system>  Would you like flying with Delta Airlines, with the flight which leaves at 5:50 am and when it returns it leaves at 11:55 am. The price for this flight ticket is $118.<user>  Is there something else you can suggest? <system>
